title: Liquifi V2 - efficient DEX protocol
description: Decentralised exchanges suffer from price slippage and impermanent loss problems that affect APY. How can we solve this in Cardano?
solution: The Liquifi team is building a DEX protocol with fair exchange rates for traders and high APY for investors to attract more Cardano users.
experience: Liquifi V1 is a unique DEX protocol in BSC and Ethereum that solves the price slippage and front-running issues with "time-locked swaps".
